items.name: cover from Lorna the Jungle Girl #6

results.title: Ant-Man: So (Trade Paperback)
results.description: It's the origin of the original Avenger, Ant-Man! Hank Pym has been known by a variety of names - including Ant-Man, Giant-Man, Goliath and Yellowjacket - he's been an innovative scientist, a famed super hero, an abusive spouse and more. What demons drive a man like Hank Pym? And how did he begin his heroic career?

textObjects.text: It's the origin of the original Avenger, Ant-Man! Hank Pym has been known by a variety of names - including Ant-Man, Giant-Man, Goliath and Yellowjacket - he's been an innovative scientist, a famed super hero, an abusive spouse and more. What demons drive a man like Hank Pym? And how did he begin his heroic career?

results.title: Brilliant (2011) #7
results.description: From the award-winning creators behind ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN and AVENGERS ASSEMBLE comes the shocking creator-owned series that gives you something very different than a regular superhero comic and asks the question: How would the world react if a group of brilliant college students actually discovered the secret of superpowers? Well now, the secret is out!

textObjects.text: From the award-winning creators behind ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN and AVENGERS ASSEMBLE comes the shocking creator-owned series that gives you something very different than a regular superhero comic and asks the question: How would the world react if a group of brilliant college students actually discovered the secret of superpowers? Well now, the secret is out!

results.title: Miracleman by Gaiman & Buckingham: The Silver Age (2016) #3
results.description: The wait is over! Neil Gaiman and Mark Buckingham present the story you’ve waited decades for — the first ALL-NEW chapter in “The Silver Age!” High atop the Himalayas, Dicky Dauntless searches to find his place in the Age of Miracles. He’ll make new friends and encounter a frightening, familiar face — Johnny Bates! It’s Young Miracleman and Kid Miracleman face-to-face!

textObjects.text: The wait is over! Neil Gaiman and Mark Buckingham present the story you’ve waited decades for — the first ALL-NEW chapter in “The Silver Age!” High atop the Himalayas, Dicky Dauntless searches to find his place in the Age of Miracles. results.title: Miracleman by Gaiman & Buckingham: The Silver Age (2016) #2
results.description: Miracleman has his old friend back, but Young Miracleman has never felt more alone. Where can a hero from a simpler time call home in this brave new world? The tensions building underneath Miracleman and Young Miracleman’s relationship explode in “When Titans Clash!” Remastered with stunning new artwork by Mark Buckingham! Including material originally presented in MIRACLEMAN (1985) #24, plus bonus content.

results.title: Rocket Raccoon & Groot (2016) #8
results.description: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! CAPTAIN MARVEL has called for backup, and ROCKET and GROOT are here to turn the tide! But as CIVIL WAR pits PARTNER against PARTNER, can Rocket and Groot’s friendship survive a TRENCHANT DISCUSSION OF THE ISSUES AT HAND?!?! Probably! But can THEY survive a confrontation with GWENPOOL?!?!

results.title: Amazing Spider-Man (2015) #17
results.description: BEFORE “DEAD NO MORE”! The Prowler (and our readers) meet the new Electro! Who is this woman and what does she have to do with the Man in Red?!

results.title: Thunderbolts (2016) #4
results.description: The Squadron Supreme delivers justice to an unjust world. Their new target — The Thunderbolts. Someone call Damage Control, ’cause this is gonna get ugly...

textObjects.text: The Squadron Supreme delivers justice to an unjust world. Their new target — The Thunderbolts. Someone call Damage Control, ’cause this is gonna get ugly...

results.title: Darth Vader (2015) #25
results.description:
It has all built up to this! Vader’s trials against Cylo’s creations! His machinations against the Emperor! His covert missions with Doctor Aphra and her murderous droids! All comes to fruition in an oversized 40-page issue by the stellar team of Kieron Gillen and Salvador Larroca! You won’t want to miss this ending!

results.description: “Last Days of Magic” aftermath! How did Stephen Strange become the Sorcerer Supreme? And how has he lost it all?

results.title: Deadpool Vs. Gambit (2016) #4
results.description: The con’s gone south, fast, which leads to…a cookout? Yep – if you wanna see Wade and Remy slinging meat, this book’s for you! Plus…we take a deep dive into the life of…The Scrambler?

results.title: Nova (2015) #10
results.description: NOVA is one of the most powerful kids in the galaxy, but where does all of that power COME from? Sam’s father is missing, and everyone else in the galaxy who’s ever been a Nova is dead or missing...Looks like Sam’s going to have to find some answers for himself.

results.title: Dark Tower: The Drawing of the Three - Bitter Medicine (2016) #5
results.description: Odetta Holmes and Detta Walker’s chapter comes to a close with this powerful issue! In an epic shootout with the police, Roland fights for his life on the streets of New York! In the midst of the chaos, Odetta will discover the true depths of her powers, as a third personality emerges!

results.title: Uncanny Avengers (2015) #13
results.description: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! Deadpool risks his Avengers status on a secret mission to rescue another Avenger! The aftermath of an explosive CIVIL WAR II event reverberates through the Avengers. Plus, Cable and Steve Rogers face off, with the future of the Unity Squad at stake.

results.title: Carnage (2015) #11
results.description: Carnage’s search for more power leads him to a mysterious and secluded island. But who are the island’s mysterious inhabitants? And what terrifying secrets do they hold?

results.title: Uncanny Inhumans (2015) #13
results.description: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! While the heroes of the Marvel Universe battle it out with each other, Medusa and the Inhumans have their own private civil war! Who will side with whom and how will the balance of power tip in New Attilan?

results.title: Hyperion (2016) #6
results.description: Hyperion must answer for his crimes! It’s HYPERION versus IRON MAN in a battle over what it truly means to be a hero…but it looks like Iron Man isn’t the only person looking for answers…and REVENGE?! Will Hyperion survive this epic showdown?

results.title: X-Men '92 (2016) #6
results.description: The X-Men are working security at LILAPALOOZA – Westchester’s biggest festival! But just because they’re security, doesn’t mean they stop being TARGETS! Guest-starring: THE FLAMING LIPS, TOADIES AND LILA CHENEY!
